programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Chooses a Best Friend / Paddington and the Lamppost) S1 (21/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Chooses a Best Friend / Paddington and the Lamppost»Paddington wins a raffle and first prize is a meal for two at Sofia's café, but who is Paddington's BEST FRIEND? // Pigeonton has nested in a Lamppost outside Mr. Gruber's shop but the council have condemned it!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington's First Snow / Paddington and the Metal Detector) S1 (24/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington's First Snow / Paddington and the Metal Detector»It's snowing in Windsor Gardens; Paddington has lost a special wooly hat given him by Aunt Lucy and must find it. // Paddington is given a Metal detector by Mr. Gruber. Beep beep beep what has Paddington found now?

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington et l'armoire) S1 (12/54)
programme.desc: «Paddington et l'armoire»Paddington is accidentally delivered inside a wardrobe to Mr. Curry's house and must get out before he is discovered.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La voiture de course de George) S4 (32/52)
programme.desc: «La voiture de course de George»It's a beautiful day, but Peppa, George, Daddy Pig, and Grandpa Pig are sitting inside watching racecar driving on television!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le petit bateau) S4 (33/52)
programme.desc: «Le petit bateau»Daddy Pig is left behind when everyone takes Grampy Rabbit's boat to the riverside picnic spot. Will someone remember him and save him some cake?

programme.title: Bubulle Guppies (Le Spectacle de sons et lumières) S6 (n°620)
programme.desc: «Le Spectacle de sons et lumières»When giant robot Buster steals all the batteries that power Solar City, which runs on the sun's energy, it's up to Solar Power Workers Nonny and Goby to stop him and get the lights back on before the big light show is cancelled!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Du nouveau à l'école de Blue) S3 (n°17)
programme.desc: «Du nouveau à l'école de Blue»Join Josh and Blue at school for a day of trying new things! Josh is excited to try being Teacher for the Day, but Blue seems nervous to try something. What could it be?

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (La photo-souvenir de Gingembre et Sauge) S3 (n°13)
programme.desc: «La photo-souvenir de Gingembre et Sauge»Mr. Salt and Mrs. Pepper are trying to take a photo of Sage and Ginger for their baby book, but they just can't seem to make the twins smile. We'll play a silly game of Blue's Clues to figure out how to make the twins giggle!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Aqua Pups Save the Reef / Aqua Pups Stop a Giant Squid) S9 (n°20)
programme.desc: «Aqua Pups Save the Reef / Aqua Pups Stop a Giant Squid»The Aqua Pups rescue Coral, Moby, and McSquidly from a submarine before it crashes into a delicate reef. // The Aqua Pups must save the Merpups' golden orb release when Moby lures a Giant Squid into Puplantis.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Aqua Pups Save a Merdinger / Aqua Pups Save the Whale Patrolle) S9 (n°19)
programme.desc: «Aqua Pups Save a Merdinger / Aqua Pups Save the Whale Patrolle»When Humdinger disguises himself as a "Merdinger" to steal the purple pearl, the PAW Patrol must return it to Puplantis. // After Moby swipes the Whale Patroller and all the Pups' vehicles, the pups climb aboard sea creatures to chase it down.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Aqua Pups Save a Mer-Race) S9 (n°18)
programme.desc: «Aqua Pups Save a Mer-Race»Aqua Pups Save a Mer-Race: The Paw Patrol take part in a big mer-race, but must come to the rescue when Moby's cheating puts Puplantis in serious danger. (S9, ep 18).

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Aqua Pups Save a Floating Castle) S9 (14/25)
programme.desc: «Aqua Pups Save a Floating Castle»When an unhappy Merpup tries to float Puplantis to the surface, it's up to the Paw Patrol and their newest member Coral (Skye's long-lost merpup cousin) to save the city and stop him.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Shares A Good Dead) S2 (n°14)
programme.desc: «Paddington Shares A Good Dead»The Browns take Paddington to London as a special treat for his birthday but they lose him on the way! // Paddington ends up in the Tower of London & has a close encounter with the Crown Jewels, a Beefeater and a Royal couple!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les amis de Chloé) S3 (46/52)
programme.desc: «Les amis de Chloé»Peppa and George go to play with Cousin Chloe and her friends, but the older children don't want to play any "baby" games.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le cours de gymnastique) S3 (47/52)
programme.desc: «Le cours de gymnastique»Peppa and her friends go to help at Edmond Elephant's birthday party, but the little children are harder to look after than they expected.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le mûrier) S3 (48/52)
programme.desc: «Le mûrier»Peppa and her family collect apples and blackberries in Granny and Grandpa Pig's garden to make a pie.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Mystery Present) S1 (n°37)
programme.desc: «The Mystery Present»Bubu, Froga and Anna are looking for Anna's Ukulele, a bouncy ball and another item belonging to Froga. When searching, they find a beautiful present. Why is it here? Who is it for? What's inside? Our friends are planning to find out!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Friendship Bouquet) S1 (n°38)
programme.desc: «The Friendship Bouquet»Froga is devastated because her sunflowers have withered in her garden and she cannot make her annual sunflower bouquet. Luckily, Anna, with her friends, searches for a solution to replace Froga's cherished sunflowers with something better!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Blue au pays des dinosaures) S3 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Blue au pays des dinosaures»It's a prehistoric game of Blue's Clues when a mysterious dinosaur egg falls out of the skidoo frame and starts to hatch! We figure out what kind of dinosaur is inside the egg so we can reunite the egg with their family.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le pique-nique de l'extrême / La Fête des tartes) S5 (5/26)
programme.desc: «Le pique-nique de l'extrême / La Fête des tartes»Daring Danny X is performing a new stunt! He is harnessed over a canyon eating an Extreme Lunch when the wind blows him upside down! // It's Pie Swap Day! Humdinger sends Rocky Kitty to take one of Mr. Porter's tasty pies, so he can join the contest.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La Pat'Patrouille sauve un lamantin) S6 (10/26)
programme.desc: «La Pat'Patrouille sauve un lamantin»Farmer Al and Farmer Yumi need help from the PAW Patrol to a get a manatee to the swamp.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (La roue de Métal / Le bongo de Bobbi) S2 (16/20)
programme.desc: «La roue de Métal / Le bongo de Bobbi»When Bobbi and Jade find an underground cavern, they end up in danger when Sir Steel goes treasure hunting!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Lady Monkey Mech / Critter Care Calamity) S2 (n°9)
programme.desc: «Lady Monkey Mech / Critter Care Calamity»Sir Steel wrecks havoc during Harvest Parade so Lady Fluffpot can shop in peace. Can Deer Squad save the parade? // Pollen from Bobbi's snuffleblooms makes everyone start getting super sneezes. Lola activates her Critter Care Centre to help everyone!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the House Guest / Paddington and the Banana) S1 (n°23)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the House Guest / Paddington and the Banana»Mr. Curry is invited by Paddington to stay with the Browns whilst his flooded house is being repaired. He thinks the Browns are too disorganized so starts to change the way things are done in the Brown's house. When will he leave? // Paddington accidentally takes a banana from the café without paying for it. He must return it before Sophia notices and calls PC Wells but Mrs. Bird turns it into a cake! What will he do?

programme.title: Mini Chef (Guacamole) S1 (n°6)
programme.desc: «Guacamole»

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Les Barbapapa des cavernes / Les petits monstres) S1 (n°12)
programme.desc: «Les Barbapapa des cavernes / Les petits monstres»The barbababies discover a strange cave. Barbalib tells the story of the caves Barbapapa and how they transformed. // The Barbababies have a sleepover in the living room. Fearing the monsters in the closet, they set up wacky traps to catch them.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (The Perfect Dinner / The Kittens) S1 (n°13)
programme.desc: «The Perfect Dinner / The Kittens»Barbapapa and Barbamama go out to celebrate their birthdays. Barbabelle is in charge and gets overwhelmed. // Barbabelle watches Bali's kittens. She's scared something will happen and won't let them out. Barbamama must intervene to help the kittens.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Le camping en famille / La parade de bienvenue) S1 (n°25)
programme.desc: «Le camping en famille / La parade de bienvenue»It's a battle of the dads when Grandpa and Daddy can't agree on the best way to camp. // When Baby's new neighbor doesn't like him, Baby pulls out all the stops to change his mind.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Rocky-Bye) S1 (n°14)
programme.desc: «Rocky-Bye»Hank struggles to overcome his fears without the help of his pet rock, Rocky.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Circus Celebration) S1 (n°14)
programme.desc: «Circus Celebration»Bubu's DVD of his favorite circus show does not work. The others create their own circus acts in the backyard. Doing acrobatics, juggling, and magic! Bubu joins them, even when the DVD player is fixed, they prefer to stay in the backyard to play!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Friendship Journal) S1 (n°15)
programme.desc: «Friendship Journal»Anna decides to make a scrapbook to celebrate Friendship, where each try to come up with something special enough to deserve the first page in her "friendship journal.".

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Hide and Seek) S1 (n°16)
programme.desc: «Hide and Seek»Anna and her friends are outside playing Ron's favorite game, Hide-and-Seek! Anna is the Seeker and quickly finds Froga, Christopher and Bubu. When the friends work together to try to find Ron, they realize he's found the best hiding spot of all.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Aqua Pups Save the Reef / Aqua Pups Stop a Giant Squid) S9 (n°20)
programme.desc: «Aqua Pups Save the Reef / Aqua Pups Stop a Giant Squid»The Aqua Pups rescue Coral, Moby, and McSquidly from a submarine before it crashes into a delicate reef. // The Aqua Pups must save the Merpups' golden orb release when Moby lures a Giant Squid into Puplantis.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Aqua Pups Save a Merdinger / Aqua Pups Save the Whale Patrolle) S9 (n°19)
programme.desc: «Aqua Pups Save a Merdinger / Aqua Pups Save the Whale Patrolle»When Humdinger disguises himself as a "Merdinger" to steal the purple pearl, the PAW Patrol must return it to Puplantis. // After Moby swipes the Whale Patroller and all the Pups' vehicles, the pups climb aboard sea creatures to chase it down.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Aqua Pups Save a Mer-Race) S9 (n°18)
programme.desc: «Aqua Pups Save a Mer-Race»Aqua Pups Save a Mer-Race: The Paw Patrol take part in a big mer-race, but must come to the rescue when Moby's cheating puts Puplantis in serious danger. (S9, ep 18).

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Aqua Pups Save a Floating Castle) S9 (14/25)
programme.desc: «Aqua Pups Save a Floating Castle»When an unhappy Merpup tries to float Puplantis to the surface, it's up to the Paw Patrol and their newest member Coral (Skye's long-lost merpup cousin) to save the city and stop him.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Big Rig to the Rescue!) S6 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Big Rig to the Rescue!»When three big deliveries are needed all over Axle City, there's only one monster machine with the power to haul it all: Big Rig Blaze! But even Big Rig Blaze may not be able to make all the deliveries in time.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Aventure extraterrestre) S5 (15/20)
programme.desc: «Aventure extraterrestre»Blaze and AJ make friends with a space alien named Gormy! But when Gormy's jetpack loses power, they set out to help him find six special space batteries so he can fly home to his alien family!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le Défilé de ballons géants / La Tarentule des cavernes) S6 (16/26)
programme.desc: «Le Défilé de ballons géants / La Tarentule des cavernes»The Turbot cousins try to spot a rare spider, but get stuck in its web. It's up to the PAW Patrol save the spider spies!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Une chaleur écrasante / Alex l'apprenti fermier) S4 (15/26)
programme.desc: «Une chaleur écrasante / Alex l'apprenti fermier»It's hot in Adventure Bay and everyone wants ice cream. Unfortunately, everything is finished and the delivery is late. Captain Turbot and Francois compete against each other in a bag-jumping competition.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Le concours de tournesol / Le voleur de lune) S2 (n°210)
programme.desc: «Le concours de tournesol / Le voleur de lune»Ricardo hosts a sunflower competition, but Lola is worried hers is ill - surely a little Wood Power will perk it up? // Lady Fluffpot wants a statue made of moon rock, but the deer know that messing with the moon is a bad idea!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Magnet Maelstrom) S1 (n°20)
programme.desc: «Magnet Maelstrom»When Sir Steel collects metal in the city for Muffin's pooch pamper parlor using a giant magnet, Deer Squad has to think out of the box to stop him.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Chooses a Best Friend / Paddington and the Lamppost) S1 (21/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Chooses a Best Friend / Paddington and the Lamppost»Paddington wins a raffle and first prize is a meal for two at Sofia's café, but who is Paddington's BEST FRIEND? // Pigeonton has nested in a Lamppost outside Mr. Gruber's shop but the council have condemned it!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington's First Snow / Paddington and the Metal Detector) S1 (24/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington's First Snow / Paddington and the Metal Detector»It's snowing in Windsor Gardens; Paddington has lost a special wooly hat given him by Aunt Lucy and must find it. // Paddington is given a Metal detector by Mr. Gruber. Beep beep beep what has Paddington found now?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La fête des enfants) S4 (30/52)
programme.desc: «La fête des enfants»The school roof is leaking and Madame Gazelle is worried because they have no money to fix it. The children come up with the idea to organize a fete to raise money for the roof. All the grown-up are invited and every kid is in charge for something else, including the bric-a-brac store, face painting and the lucky dip.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'aquarium) S4 (31/52)
programme.desc: «L'aquarium»Goldie the Goldfish is feeling a little lonely, so Peppa takes her to the aquarium.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La voiture de course de George) S4 (32/52)
programme.desc: «La voiture de course de George»It's a beautiful day, but Peppa, George, Daddy Pig, and Grandpa Pig are sitting inside watching racecar driving on television!

programme.desc: «Le petit bateau»Daddy Pig is left behind when everyone takes Grampy Rabbit's boat to the riverside picnic spot. Will someone remember him and save him some cake?

programme.desc: «Aqua Pups Save a Floating Castle»When an unhappy Merpup tries to float Puplantis to the surface, it's up to the Paw Patrol and their newest member Coral (Skye's long-lost merpup cousin) to save the city and stop him.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Shares A Good Dead) S2 (n°14)
programme.desc: «Paddington Shares A Good Dead»The Browns take Paddington to London as a special treat for his birthday but they lose him on the way! // Paddington ends up in the Tower of London & has a close encounter with the Crown Jewels, a Beefeater and a Royal couple!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Vilaine Tortue) S4 (6/52)
programme.desc: «Vilaine Tortue»Dr Hamster's pet tortoise Tiddles gets stuck up a tree - who is going to come to the rescue?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le magasin de Monsieur Fox) S4 (5/52)
programme.desc: «Le magasin de Monsieur Fox»Granny and Grandpa Pig are celebrating their anniversary, and Peppa and George go to Mr Fox's shop to buy them a present. The shop is full of different things, so siblings don't know what to choose for their grandparents.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les ombres) S4 (7/52)
programme.desc: «Les ombres»Peppa and George realise that they have shadows and no matter what they do, they can't escape from them.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (King for a Day) S1 (n°41)
programme.desc: «King for a Day»Today the friends play King For A Day, someone throws the crown on Christopher's head! Then the crown leaves his head and ends on his cousin, Benjy, who just came for a day visit. Benjy only wants to play with his cousin, and do whatever he wants.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Vegetable Pie) S1 (n°42)
programme.desc: «The Vegetable Pie»Froga's strawberries are sick so she's going to miss this year's vegetable picking. When Bubu offers her a walkie-talkie to use, she agrees to let him baby-sit her sick plant for her. But soon, Froga loses confidence in Bubu's ability to help.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Le plus tendre des liens / L'empire orange) S1 (5/52)
programme.desc: «Le plus tendre des liens / L'empire orange»While the family makes pottery, Barbabravo and Barbabright try to set the world record for the largest cheese soufflé. // The Barbapapas decide to go to the park. While her brother and sisters play , Barbalib can't help to control everything.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Blue s'amuse dans la neige) S3 (n°7)
programme.desc: «Blue s'amuse dans la neige»There are SNOW many great things to do on a snowy day like today, but Blue's surprise may be the best! We'll play a wintry game of Blue's Clues to figure out what her surprise is.

programme.title: Bubulle Guppies (Le Petit Chien et l'Anneau) S3 (9/26)
programme.desc: «Le Petit Chien et l'Anneau»After Molly and Gil meet Bobby, a nature show host from Australia, they can't wait to learn all about Australian animals. From marsupials to the amazing platypus, the Guppies can't get enough of the creatures Down Under!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Moontaker) S2 (n°10)
programme.desc: «Moontaker»Moontaker: Lady Fluffpot wants a statue made of moon rock, but the deer know that messing with the moon is a bad idea! (S2, ep 10b).

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington's Plant Problem / Paddington the Artist) S2 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Paddington's Plant Problem / Paddington the Artist»Paddington realizes he has been watering the wrong plant while Mr. Curry is away on holiday! / Mrs. Brown wants Windsor Gardens to artistically express themselves. Paddington doesn't know what art is, so he sets out to find what he's good at!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington et son quartier) S2 (n°26)
programme.desc: «Paddington et son quartier»Paddington & the Kids overhear Mr. Brown talking about selling the house! Will they really have to leave Windsor Gardens?

programme.title: Mini Chef (Apple Pie) S1 (n°6)
programme.desc: «Apple Pie»

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (The Treasure Hunt / Going into the Wild) S1 (n°14)
programme.desc: «The Treasure Hunt / Going into the Wild»Mr. Strict's twins visit the barbababies. The barbababies organize a treasure hunt for the twins and enjoy the great outdoors. // The Barbapapas are off to a new adventure... in the garden. But living in nature is more complicated than they expected.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (L'océan fuchsia / Zéro déchet) S1 (n°15)
programme.desc: «L'océan fuchsia / Zéro déchet»The Barbabies win a touchpad. They all want to use it and snaffle it one after another.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Une vie de star / Méchant Hank) S1 (n°20)
programme.desc: «Une vie de star / Méchant Hank»The Tentacools (Baby, William, and Vola) get caught up in the trappings of being rock starfishes and forget that they formed the band to have fun.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Rainy Day Roundup) S1 (n°13)
programme.desc: «Rainy Day Roundup»When an underwater storm rains on Baby Shark and William's fun, they doubt whether they can have an adventure indoors.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (A Very Busy Afternoon) S1 (n°17)
programme.desc: «A Very Busy Afternoon»Froga organises a gathering to share jam sandwiches with everyone, Ron and Christopher want to show off their acrobatic frisbee skills, Bubu invents a new game he wants to teach his friends - all at the same time!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Four-Leaf Clover) S1 (n°18)
programme.desc: «The Four-Leaf Clover»Anna and her friends have organized a hula hoop competition and Froga relies on her four-leaf clover to help her win! But when she loses it, Froga is convinced there is no way she'll ever win.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Collection) S1 (n°19)
programme.desc: «The Collection»Upon seeing Ron's stick collection, Froga learns for the first time what "a collection" is. Anna would like to create one of her own. The others have all one sticks, bubbles, sounds, tools. They help Anna to find her memories with her friends.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Aqua Pups Save the Reef / Aqua Pups Stop a Giant Squid) S9 (n°20)
programme.desc: «Aqua Pups Save the Reef / Aqua Pups Stop a Giant Squid»The Aqua Pups rescue Coral, Moby, and McSquidly from a submarine before it crashes into a delicate reef. // The Aqua Pups must save the Merpups' golden orb release when Moby lures a Giant Squid into Puplantis.

programme.desc: «Aqua Pups Save a Floating Castle»When an unhappy Merpup tries to float Puplantis to the surface, it's up to the Paw Patrol and their newest member Coral (Skye's long-lost merpup cousin) to save the city and stop him.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (La course de la Montagne Céleste) S6 (n°6)
programme.desc: «La course de la Montagne Céleste»At the starting line for Race to Sky High Mountain, one of Crusher's cheats threatens to sideline Blaze for good. To get back in this race, Blaze will need... Power Tires!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Sire Blaze et la licorne) S6 (n°4)
programme.desc: «Sire Blaze et la licorne»Witness the return of Sir Blaze and Sir AJ as they embark on an epic quest to free a magical unicorn from an unpoppable bubble!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save a Bookmobile / Pups Save Heady Humdinger) S5 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Pups Save a Bookmobile / Pups Save Heady Humdinger»When Ms. Marjorie brings her bookmobile to Everest and the kids of the mountains, Maynard accidentally sets the van rolling and goes off on a wild ride. // Mayor Humdinger has been carving his face into the cliffs of Adventure Bay!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Au pays des papayes / La récolte de maïs) S5 (10/26)
programme.desc: «Au pays des papayes / La récolte de maïs»Carlos and Tracker make PawPaw juice with the Paw Patrol when they find out Mayor Goodway and Chickaletta are in trouble.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (La chasse aux gros insectes / Le Cerf-ball) S2
programme.desc: «La chasse aux gros insectes / Le Cerf-ball»Lady Fluffpot hates mini-beasts - and Sir Steel creates MEGA-beasts that the Deer squad must deal with. // Things get competitive when Sir Steel takes on the Deer Squad for the Deer Ball Cup - but who's bending the rules?
